name: Solitude 1.2
description:
Solitude is a game in which you play as an astronaut maintaining an old space outpost and trying to get funding to restore it. To convince the investors, you have to reach a few milestones. The first one is to survive for 10 in-game days in the base(nothing much to do here, but it gets interesting later). Note that this alpha works only on a Windows PC and is finished till the first milestone. Try the game and suggest changes, ask doubts, and report bugs at my discord server https://discord.gg/WbPfDFA . This is my first game, so your support will be helpful. May the Sun light your way.

Alpha 1.1: Help page added.

1.2: Fixed major bugs, added WASD controls, changed the textures of many objects, finished till Goal 1
